Added_Other.name: FFlagAccountLockConsoleLogout
Added_Other.mechanism: Enforces account lock when logging out from console devices.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances account security by preventing unauthorized access after logout.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableAccountLockModal
Added_Other.mechanism: Introduces a modal that appears when an account is locked.
Added_Other.purpose: Informs players about account security and helps them take necessary actions.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableBiometricChallenges
Added_Other.mechanism: Introduces biometric authentication methods for account security.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances player account safety by adding extra verification steps.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableChallengeRateLimit
Added_Other.mechanism: Enforces a cap on how many challenges can be completed in a specific period.
Added_Other.purpose: Encourages players to engage with challenges more thoughtfully and reduces abuse.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableNativeChallengeAbandonment
Added_Other.mechanism: Allows players to abandon challenges natively within the game.
Added_Other.purpose: Gives players more control and flexibility to exit challenges they no longer wish to pursue.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPersonaLivenessFocusNavigation
Added_Other.mechanism: Enhances navigation by keeping track of user focus in the UI.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves user experience by making it easier to navigate through menus and options.

Removed_Other.name: FFlagAccountLockConsoleLogout_Staged
Removed_Other.mechanism: Enables automatic logout from the console when an account is locked.
Removed_Other.purpose: Keeps player accounts secure by ensuring they cannot access the game if their account is locked.

Removed_Other.name: FFlagEnableAccountLockModal_Staged
Removed_Other.mechanism: Introduces a modal that prompts users to lock their accounts for security.
Removed_Other.purpose: Enhances account security by encouraging players to protect their accounts.

Removed_Other.name: FFlagEnableBiometricChallenges_Staged
Removed_Other.mechanism: Introduces biometric authentication options for account security.
Removed_Other.purpose: Enhances account protection by allowing fingerprint or facial recognition.

Removed_Other.name: FFlagEnableChallengeRateLimit_Staged
Removed_Other.mechanism: Limits the number of challenges a player can attempt in a given time frame.
Removed_Other.purpose: Prevents players from spamming challenges, ensuring a fairer gameplay experience.

Removed_Other.name: FFlagEnableNativeChallengeAbandonment_Staged
Removed_Other.mechanism: Allows players to abandon in-game challenges natively within the game interface.
Removed_Other.purpose: Gives players the option to exit challenges easily without needing to restart the game.

Removed_Other.name: FFlagPersonaLivenessFocusNavigation_Staged
Removed_Other.mechanism: Enhances navigation focus in the persona system for better user experience.
Removed_Other.purpose: Makes it easier for players to navigate their profiles and settings.
